ValidationRule.description:
Primary Contact in an Indirect opportunity where Direct to UC = False, cannot be from the related opportunity's ultimate consignee account, unless the UC account's Account Group = 'Distributor'.
DCP-58826 (AC #1)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( CONTAINS(Opportunity.RecordType.DeveloperName, 'Indirect'), NOT(Text(Opportunity.Ultimate_Consignee__r.Account_Group__c)='Distributor'), Contact.AccountId = Opportunity.Ultimate_Consignee__c, Opportunity.Direct_Sale_to_Ultimate_Consignee__c = false, IsPrimaryContactFromUC__c = True, $Profile.Name != $Label.ProfileSystemAdmin )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For Indirect Opportunities (except Direct to UC), do not use a contact/email address associated with a UC contact. Instead, use aÂ contact/e-mail address associated with a Distributor
